name: Integrated Business Strategies
description: We help organisations achieve compliance, performance, and lasting impact. Integrated Business Strategies (IBS) partners with organisations to drive operational excellence, compliance, and sustainable growth. Our team brings deep expertise across SHREQ, engineering, and capability building â€” delivering hands-on solutions that improve how work gets done. We combine proven methods with local context to help you meet regulatory requirements, streamline processes, and empower your people.

values.name: Excellence
values.description: High standards in every engagement and deliverable.

values.name: Integrity
values.description: Transparent, honest partnerships that earn trust.

values.name: Innovation
values.description: Practical improvements powered by new ideas.

process.title: Assess
process.description: Baseline current practices and define the outcomes that matter.

process.title: Enable
process.description: Implement processes, skills, and tools that stick.

process.title: Improve

name: Greenfield Resources
description: Greenfield Resources is an ISO Certified (ISO 9001-2015), B-BBEE Level 1, multi-disciplinary, built environment, consulting firm. We support clients in planning, design, procurement, and implementation of infrastructure and building projects. Established in 2012, we have a track record of excellence, efficiency, and integrity in infrastructure project delivery.
mission: To improve the lives of communities through delivering transformative projects.
purpose: To enrich, empower and INSPIRE communities through the efficient and effective delivery of infrastructure projects.
strategicIntent: To be the leader in the efficient and effective delivery of Infrastructure projects.

coreValues.name: INTEGRITY
coreValues.description: We strive to be truthful and honest in our business dealings by producing high-quality work on time, regardless of the tasks at hand.

coreValues.name: EFFICIENCY
coreValues.description: We utilise resources in a sustainable manner by prioritising tasks in order of importance and urgency and removing non-essential activities and processes.

coreValues.name: AGILITY
coreValues.description: Our teams are flexible and will collaborate, learn from each other, and graciously accept feedback from clients and stakeholders.

name: RPS Switchgear SA
description: Leading manufacturer of reliable, safe, and environmentally friendly electrical switchgear solutions.
